facts.1: Marks the anniversary of the Egyptian Revolution of 1952 when the monarchy was overthrown.
facts.2: It is a national holiday in Egypt celebrated with military parades.
facts.3: The day is remembered as the beginning of modern Egyptian state and social justice.

Day 2.title: National Vanilla Ice Cream Day (United States)

facts.1: Celebrates the popular vanilla ice cream flavor each year on July 23.
facts.2: Vanilla is derived from the orchids of Central Mexico.
facts.3: Thomas Jefferson introduced vanilla ice cream to the US after experiencing it in France.

facts.1: Held on the birthday of Dr. Henrik Sjögren, who first identified the syndrome.
facts.2: Sjögren's syndrome is a systemic autoimmune disease that affects the body.
facts.3: The day promotes awareness and understanding of the condition.
